content: *snuggle under this witty jiffy afghan and you are guaranteed to be in dreamland before you count that black sheep lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 20005ad corrections applied jul 21 2003 skill level beginner + level 2 jiffy® article #450 7 colors 14 balls total crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm work body in single_crochet following color chart crochet border to finish
